name: Runegame
description:
A game where you perform operations on electromagnetic runes to solve puzzles.

Controls:

WASD/Mouse - move/look

F - Interact

Press the button near the doorway(or pass through an open door) to reset all machines and runes.

Home  - Restart game (use ONLY if you get stuck in geometry or something, there's no save system so you'll have to redo all the puzzles)
